languages.text: "Сегодня ваш счастливый день — оставьте то, что хотели украсть, и уходите".
"Today is your lucky day — put down what you hoped to steal and walk away."
languages.original_text: "Сегодня ваш счастливый день — оставьте то, что хотели украсть, и уходите".

traits.locale_text: "Today is your lucky day — put down what you hoped to steal and walk away."
"Today is your lucky day — put down what you hoped to steal and walk away."
"Today is your lucky day — put down what you hoped to steal and walk away."
"Today is your lucky day — put down what you hoped to steal and walk away."
"Today is your lucky day — put down what you hoped to steal and walk away."

languages.text: «Hoy es su día de suerte: suelten lo que pretendían robar y márchense».
languages.original_text: "Today is your lucky day — put down what you hoped to steal and walk away."

traits.locale_text: «Hoy es su día de suerte: suelten lo que pretendían robar y márchense».

languages.text: 「今日のお前は運がいい。盗もうとしていたものを置いて、この場から立ち去れ」
languages.original_text: "Today is your lucky day — put down what you hoped to steal and walk away."

traits.locale_text: 「今日のお前は運がいい。盗もうとしていたものを置いて、この場から立ち去れ」

languages.text: “今天算你们走运，把手里的东西放下，赶紧走。”
languages.original_text: "Today is your lucky day — put down what you hoped to steal and walk away."

traits.locale_text: “今天算你们走运，把手里的东西放下，赶紧走。”

languages.text: "Heute ist euer Glückstag ... legt ab, was ihr stehlen wolltet und geht."
languages.original_text: "Today is your lucky day — put down what you hoped to steal and walk away."

traits.locale_text: "Heute ist euer Glückstag ... legt ab, was ihr stehlen wolltet und geht."

languages.text: « C'est votre jour de chance ; reposez votre butin mal acquis et débarrassez-moi le plancher. »
languages.original_text: "Today is your lucky day — put down what you hoped to steal and walk away."

traits.locale_text: « C'est votre jour de chance ; reposez votre butin mal acquis et débarrassez-moi le plancher. »

languages.text: "Bugün şanslı gününüz. Çalmayı umduğunuz malları yere bırakıp uzaklaşın."
languages.original_text: "Today is your lucky day — put down what you hoped to steal and walk away."
